newHere.heroSubtitle: Your first visit should be a great one. Here's what you need to know.
newHere.serviceTimesDesc: We meet every Sunday at 10:00 AM. The service typically lasts about 75 minutes.
newHere.locationDesc: You can find us at 123 Community Lane, Anytown, USA. There's plenty of parking available.
newHere.worshipStyleDesc: Our services feature contemporary worship music led by a live band. Feel free to sing along or simply listen and reflect.
newHere.whatToWearDesc: There's no dress code. You'll see everything from jeans to suits. Please wear whatever makes you feel comfortable.
newHere.forYourKidsDesc: We have a safe, fun, and engaging children's ministry for kids from birth through 5th grade during the service.
newHere.ourBeliefsDesc: We are a Bible-believing church that is passionate about sharing the love of Jesus with our community.
newHere.getConnectedDesc: The best way to get to know us is to get involved. We'd love for you to fill out a connect card.

give.pageSubtitle: Your generosity helps us continue our work in the community and beyond.

childrenPage.title: Children's Ministry
childrenPage.subtitle: Where kids learn about Jesus in a fun and safe environment.
childrenPage.section1Content: Our mission is to partner with parents to lead children into a growing relationship with Jesus Christ. We strive to create environments where kids can learn about God's love in a way that is engaging, creative, and memorable.
childrenPage.section2Content: We offer age-appropriate classes during our Sunday service for Nursery (0-2 years), Preschool (3-5 years), and Elementary (Grades 1-5). Each class is designed to present biblical truths in a way your child can understand.
childrenPage.section3Content: Your child's safety is our top priority. All of our volunteers are background-checked and trained to provide a secure and welcoming environment. We use a secure check-in system for all children attending our programs.

youthPage.title: Youth Ministry
youthPage.subtitle: Connecting students (Grades 6-12) with God and each other.
youthPage.section1Content: Our youth group is a vibrant community of students dedicated to growing in their faith, serving others, and having a lot of fun along the way. We aim to create a space where teenagers feel they belong and can ask tough questions about life and faith.
youthPage.section2Content: We meet every Wednesday night from 7:00-8:30 PM for games, worship, a relevant message, and small group discussions. We also have monthly events, summer camps, and service projects.
youthPage.section3Content: Whether you're new or have been coming for years, we'd love to have you join us. Check out the events page for our next activity or just show up on a Wednesday night. All are welcome!

smallGroupsPage.title: Small Groups
smallGroupsPage.subtitle: Life is better connected.
smallGroupsPage.section1Content: Small Groups are the heart of our church community. They are groups of 8-12 people who meet regularly in homes throughout the city to study the Bible, pray for one another, and build authentic relationships. It's where a big church feels small.
smallGroupsPage.section2Content: We believe that spiritual growth happens best in the context of relationships. Small Groups provide an opportunity to connect with others on a deeper level, to be cared for, and to be challenged in your faith journey. You can't do life alone!
smallGroupsPage.section3Content: We have groups for all ages and stages of life, including men's, women's, couples, and young adults groups. Finding a group is easy. Visit our welcome center on Sunday or contact us to get connected.

contactPage.title: Contact Us
contactPage.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Let us know how we can help.
contactPage.messageSentDesc: Thank you for reaching out. We'll get back to you as soon as possible.

prayerPage.title: Prayer Requests
prayerPage.subtitle: Let us know how we can be praying for you.
prayerPage.intro: We believe in the power of prayer. Our prayer team is committed to praying for every request submitted. Please know that your request is a sacred trust and will be kept confidential.
prayerPage.requestSentDesc: Thank you for sharing your request. Our prayer team will be praying for you.

privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.p1: Your privacy is important to us. It is Community Grace Church's policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our website.
privacyPage.p2: We only ask for personal information when we truly need it to provide a service to you. We collect it by fair and lawful means, with your knowledge and consent. We also let you know why we’re collecting it and how it will be used.
privacyPage.p3: We only retain collected information for as long as necessary to provide you with your requested service. What data we store, we’ll protect within commercially acceptable means to prevent loss and theft, as well as unauthorized access, disclosure, copying, use or modification.
privacyPage.p4: We don’t share any personally identifying information publicly or with third-parties, except when required to by law.
privacyPage.p5: Our website may link to external sites that are not operated by us. Please be aware that we have no control over the content and practices of these sites, and cannot accept responsibility or liability for their respective privacy policies.
privacyPage.p6: You are free to refuse our request for your personal information, with the understanding that we may be unable to provide you with some of your desired services.
